content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Maryam. However, due to our different approaches to negotiations, I'm afraid I must prioritize those who align more closely with my own methods. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because of our potential disparity in strategies. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
